1140660.name: 长途客车模拟 - 比利时
1140660.description:
This DLC will add the country of Belgium to the game world of Fernbus Simulator. The country is bordered by the Netherlands, Germany, Luxembourg and France and is part of the Benelux Union.

Features:
  • A seamless extension of the world map - without any loading times between regions
  • New unique and true to original bus stops
  • New depots
  • About additional 3.068km² of map
  • 4 new cities:
    • The capital city Brussels
    • Antwerp
    • Charleroi
    • Ghent
  • True to original license plates
  • True to original AI police car repaint
  • New regional props and sights
  • and much more to explore
1140660.supported_languages:
英语, 德语*, 法语, 波兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 土耳其语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 匈牙利语, 瑞典语, 日语, 简体中文, 芬兰语, 荷兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
